p:
The two ESMs from CMIP5 ( https://pcmdi.llnl.gov/?cmip5/) provided the necessary physical and biochemical outputs to force our MEMs, particularly monthly depth-resolved fields of phytoplankton and zooplankton size groups (
SI Appendix, SI Methods and Table S2 ). Average trends of GFDL-ESM2M and IPSL-CM5A-LR reflect the multimodel mean and range of a broad set of CMIP5 models ( 14). The four RCPs represent standard IPCC informed emission scenarios (
SI Appendix, SI Methods ).
